segment.source: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist

segment.source: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist

segment.source: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Planning Checklist

segment.source: You can use the following checklists to help you prepare your computing environment for the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) deployment.
segment.target: You can use the following checklists to help you prepare your computing environment for the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) deployment.

segment.source: The checklists provide a high-level list of items to consider when planning the deployment.
segment.target: The checklists provide a high-level list of items to consider when planning the deployment.

segment.source: There are separate checklists for the Stand-alone topology and the Configuration Manager Integration topology.
segment.target: There are separate checklists for the Stand-alone topology and the Configuration Manager Integration topology.

segment.source: You might want to copy the desired checklist into a spreadsheet and customize it for your use.
segment.target: You might want to copy the desired checklist into a spreadsheet and customize it for your use.

segment.source: Planning checklist for an MBAM deployment
segment.target: Planning checklist for an MBAM deployment

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.target: References

segment.target: Notes

segment.source: Review the Getting started information to understand the product before you start deployment planning.
segment.target: Review the Getting started information to understand the product before you start deployment planning.

segment.source: Getting Started with MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Getting Started with MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Review the recommended high-level architecture for an MBAM deployment.
segment.target: Review the recommended high-level architecture for an MBAM deployment.

segment.source: You might also want to review an illustration and description of the individual parts (databases, websites, Reports) of an MBAM deployment.
segment.target: You might also want to review an illustration and description of the individual parts (databases, websites, Reports) of an MBAM deployment.

segment.source: Review and complete the prerequisites for the MBAM Stand-alone and Configuration Manager Integration topologies.
segment.target: Review and complete the prerequisites for the MBAM Stand-alone and Configuration Manager Integration topologies.

segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Server Prerequisites for Stand-alone and Configuration Manager Integration Topologies

segment.source: If you plan to use the Configuration Manager Integration topology, complete the additional prerequisites that apply only to this topology.
segment.target: If you plan to use the Configuration Manager Integration topology, complete the additional prerequisites that apply only to this topology.

segment.source: MBAM 2.5 Server Prerequisites that Apply Only to the Configuration Manager Integration Topology
segment.target: MBAM 2.5 Server Prerequisites that Apply Only to the Configuration Manager Integration Topology

segment.target: Review and meet the MBAM 2.5 prerequisites for the MBAM Client.
